reviews.review: Very nice game when you destroy enemy but bad game if your teammates are from russia.
bad game, but addicting so i play it.
game are good but usually community is toxic

Its amazing to see the progress of this game from the original version. Very fun FPS.  Its the only game i play when I can find time. Make sure you have a microphone and if you can get a group of friends to play with the strategy portion of the game turns it into way more than just a point and shoot First Person Shooter. Also very very easy to sink tons of money into skins.
Только в этой игре ты узнаешь кто твоя мама и, как тебя зовут.
No cóż tutaj dużo mówić... klasyk!

Amazing game, amazing community, and huge in Esports. Game is just incredible. Its over 9 years old and still runs and looks amazing. It is really fun if you play with a friend or two, but you could still have fun by yourself. Just an amazing game overall. If you like challenging shooters, then definitely try this!!

i love the game but i get comp bans easily as my internet is so bad. i dont leave games i just be afk for 3 rounds. i get kicked by my internet and get bans and inoccently get kicked. i cant afford good internet but its enouph to play this game. these high ping servers and matchmaking makes it worse as im supposed to have 40 ping but have near 110 ping. like i  said i love this game but i cant play it with the comp bans

It feels more solid than the old games, you don't feel cheated by lag and question hit boxes as much. I miss all the custom maps and whackyness (e.g. fy_* and gg_* maps) that still exists in CS 1.6  and CS Source though.
best game you can ever play

Good and requires tactic and IQ
